query.name: get_account_symbol_pointers
query.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT &ifp_equipment_type_symbol;.symbol_pointer, &ifp_equipment_type_symbol;.equipment_type_id, &ifp_equipment;_type.name, &ifp_equipment_type_symbol;.equipment_type_symbol_id, &ifp_equipment;_type.equipment_type_id, &ifp_equipment;_type_images.equipment_type_image_id
FROM &ifp_equipment_type_symbol;, &ifp_equipment;_type
LEFT JOIN &ifp_equipment;_type_images ON &ifp_equipment;_type_images.equipment_type_id=&ifp_equipment;_type.equipment_type_id
